text: I will start on higher education and research at the contact conference at 09.30. Follow the shipment here: http://bit.ly/4EW4sp
A sombre day; His Majesty & I received the bodies of 3 courageous Jordanian peacekeepers killed in Haiti. God bless their souls.
I think that it was possible to have a heavy discussion today. The regular Diet session is 150 days. I will do my utmost throughout the day for the citizens.
Prime Minister photo with the new Cabinet http://www.flickr.com/photos/thaigov/4284628629/in/set-72157623110855691/

Prime Minister to kick off special football with the Royal Navy Rayong. http://ow.ly/Ys34
UNICEF has been in Haiti helping children since 1949 & continues to do so today- Please follow UNICEF http://twitter.com/unicef
Hi @BillGates nice to see u here.Hope we'll get a chance to meet up in Davos.
@mrskutcher Great to see you here as well! Hope our paths ever cross in the real world.

The House of Representatives and Budget Committee has started. From today it is a real debate. I will tighten myself and see you. The supplementary budget for your peace of mind and growth is being discussed. The content is here. Please see PDF on PC. http://bit.ly/6PcD64
Prime Minister at Thai Koo Fah Building Government House http://ow.ly/Ys45
Tapioca and Tapioca Association Meet the prime minister of flour moths. http://ow.ly/Ys84

I wrote about the supplementary budget and the budget for next year discussed in the National Assembly and about the problems of political funds in the mail magazine. take a look. I would like to listen seriously to your opinions and criticism. http://bit.ly/4xnrG8
Photos of the World Cup http://bit.ly/4TJSvn
Have blogged about work on a new contract for reduced sickness absence at work.mittarbeiderparti.no: http://bit.ly/4Eimjf

Today, I visited Tochigi prefecture and asked the staff of strawberry farmers and everyone involved in Mashiko, as well as the live voices of advanced technology companies, night nurseries, medical and nursing care workers. I will cherish everyone's voice and I will make it to politics. I am planning to go on and on and on in the future.

Mail arrived from Rep. Koyoku Fujita, who is going to Haiti this morning. We are deeply grateful to President for the support of Japan. I will let you know about the situation of the afflicted area, activities of the aid team, so I'd like to report it all in a blog soon.
Regular Diet, first week passed. It is fulfilling everyday. I thought that I am interested in what kind of days I wrote on my blog. http://bit.ly/8ZRbfi

Even during the Diet period, I will visit various places as much as possible on weekends in order to hear your voice directly. Yesterday I went to Tochigi prefecture. The photo is black tea and Pon Bunch with Miko grilled ware. I also heard that I want to send Mashiko brand abroad. http://bit.ly/6il46G
# Top50Jo Dibbeen and Ajloun in the Spring

# Top50Jo That while everyone raves about benefits of olive oil, we ONLY ever use it!
Zaatar, Abu Mahjoob, the Hatta ...

http://twitpic.com/zl5zy - # Top50Jo Remember chatting 2 Abu Ahmad in downtown Amman. He's a legend. Such a warm & generous spirit. May God r
Thank you to everyone who sets up and contributes to the artist talent of Haiti tonight. The government doubles emergency aid from 100 to 200 million kr
Woke up to tragic news: an Ethiopian Airlines jet crashed in sea off Beirut this morning. My heart goes out to loved ones waiting for news.
God bless the courageous search and rescue teams battling interminable conditions in the sea to find survivors.
Prime Reply to http://pm.go.th 1. ICT to use data capture? 2. The GT200 Amphetamine Detector? 3. http://bit.ly/7UaAZL
The supplementary budget passed the House of Representatives earlier. It is deliberation at the Upper House from tomorrow. I will tighten myself and see you.
Young people from the school of Wu Zhou Seo to meet the Prime Minister before the water level. Asia Pacific http://www.flickr.com/photos/thaigov/4305414991/
Yesterday, January 25, 2010, we submitted the final financial report of the election campaign. Auditor's opinion and list ... http://bit.ly/507FIg
Mr. Suwat Liptapanlop meets Prime Minister, donates money from King's Cup football to help victims of Haiti. http://ow.ly/10tqm
Today, it is one year since the government's action package was presented. We can now summarize that the measures worked. http://bit.ly/64golA

I received my report from the Democratic Party of Japan Study Team visiting Haiti, Rep. Koyoku Fujita and Representative Nobuhiko Shuto, I wrote my thoughts on the blog. Please have a look. http://bit.ly/8ZRbfi

"New Public" round table meeting began. This conference aims to make citizens, NPOs and companies more active in public situations. We received active discussions and valuable suggestions and received great intellectual stimulation.
Scarf: check. Gloves: check. Warmest coat: check. Secret hand warmers: check. I'm ready for the World Economic Forum at Davos!
#WEF theme: Rethink. Redesign. Rebuild. MY theme for #WEF: Education. Education. Education. Are our themes synonymous?
Come to "The inauguration ceremony" Thursday, February 18 from 12:00 am to 3:00 am http://bit.ly/cciC3K
Today, the supplementary budget passed by the Upper House, was established. Next time we will advance the next fiscal year budget, politics for your life a step by step.

I decided to hold an event entitled "Real Pigeon Cafe" in order to listen to the opinions of everyone's lives. I will also enter the circle of talk. The first "child rearing cafe" is in mid-February. If you would like to participate, please click here. http://bit.ly/8ZRbfi

Today, I will make a speech policy speech. I have thought and devoted myself to himself since I was a business trip to India at the end of last year. Please listen to it in live broadcast from 1 pm. If you watch it on PC, it is here. http://bit.ly/9C7Xd4
Early morning, sun not up in snowy serene Davos. Getting ready for marathon meetings / interviews
Was nice to see P.Clinton. Heard abt his tire effort & concern 4 people of Haiti. Stories of survival, hope the world must never forget
http://twitpic.com/10b675 - Feeling very proud at Davos, His Majesty: "If someone threatens my people I have the right to defend them"
His Majesty at Davos: "For evil to succeed is for a good man to do nothing", "It boils down to: Education, Education, Education!"

Today, both the House of Representatives made a speech policy speech. A total of 1 hour and 40 minutes, the voice withered, but I gave my utmost to say the most. Please take a look at PC. http://bit.ly/bOgCQJ
http://twitpic.com/10bcsx - 2 of my wonderful girls, the force behind what I do, and oh yeah, that guy there is Pres Clinton
In Ruhango, highlights his interest in politics that pull Rwandans from poverty and takes Rwanda towards development.http://bit.ly/dlnJHW
Prime Minister dined at the World Economic Forum 2010 in Davos. http://twitpic.com/10g6rd (image by @korbsak)
Stepped off #WEF panel on education into BBC interviews.Dynamic discussion, inspired that edu message resonating w WEFers.
Was moved by applause 4 role of edu in Palestine-Israel. Our hope not w doctors on either side but w new gen 2 overcome hate & fear

Today I visited Yamanashi Prefecture and talked with the university students in the prefecture as a base seat. I was very dependable on young people who made ties dyed with wine to revitalize the local industry and passionate about developing fuel cells. Everyone college students who have a certain "whereabouts and turnouts" in this area gained spirits.

A month has passed since I started Twitter. Reading comments received from everyone has become a little fun of recent times. Thank you very much. Of course, there are some earwaxing opinions, but I have taken it properly.
After short yet intense time at Davos, went on to battle the elements-snow, rain etc, but made it home in time for husband & son's bday
Yes, 5 years ago I did not know what to get my husband for his birthday, so I got him a son :)

Yesterday, during a meeting with local people at Kofu, when I looked out, Mt. Fuji was faintly seen in Zenkoji in Kofu and in the other side. It is a beautiful sight unique to midwinter. http://bit.ly/c7JjRc
http://twitpic.com/10pou8 - At my son's birthday party
Thank you for various opinions on the administrative policy speech on 29th. I am reading. The speech is posted here. Please see with PC. http://bit.ly/bOgCQJ
Thailand's Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra, http://ow.ly/12t6o
Interview @KeepMeNot

We held a summit with President Calderón in Mexico. This year is the 400th anniversary of exchange between Japan and Mexico. And concerning global warming COP 16 is Mexico's chair country. In the milestone year, we decided to jointly declare our determination to strengthen friendship cooperation relations between the two countries. http://bit.ly/dzn8za
Come back from Switzerland. The meeting is going well.
My interview w BBC World News' @NikGowing airs tonight on new prog. 'The Hub' @ 16:00 GMT in case u have nothing better to do!
The National Assembly also enters the third week, and in a representative question, controversy over my administrative policy speech etc. continues. It is everyday that the tension continues.

A real dove cafe, a short public offering period, about 700 people received applications. Thank you very much. Actually, I'd like to invite you, but I can invite you this time after 10 names. I would like to hear a story firmly for each and every one.

It is a representative question in the plenary session to this day. The total number of questions from representatives of each faction may exceed 100 questions per day. There is time constraint, and it is said that it is said that it is too long to answer carefully, so it is annoying.
Prime Minister Reveals Extrinsic Debt Transfers Back into the System http://ow.ly/13gQN
has presented "Cooperation for Work", which will start on February 15th: http://tinyurl.com/yh7o3xt
@notreallyjodie Have not decided. I'm still practicing! Good luck to you though! Ahlan wa sahlan.
@notreallyjodie Jordan's a beautiful place; so much to see & do & offer visitors: http://bit.ly/JBc40 & http://bit.ly/avVPzD
Undersea cables bring opportunity, these networks must reach our cities and villages to bring knowledge and prosperity. http://bit.ly/aysT1M
Thank you everyone for your kind words about my #WEF interviews. Keep your comments coming. I love to hear what you think!
Jordan's all over CNN today: # top50JO on @CNNiReport at 5:30 GMT and @RichardQuest at 7 GMT where I get quizzed about a lunchbox!
Prime confident in the security officer that will take care of the full. http://ow.ly/13E64
Prime Reply to http://pm.go.th 1. Check the GT200. 2. The government created the problem. 3. Do not get caught up in the case of Public Health http://bit.ly/c94Dof
Today is the beginning of spring. Spring is on the calendar, but it still has a cold day. I wrote about "new public" in the mail magazine. Please look. http://bit.ly/b6asE9
Snow falling in Amman today; my little one willing the white stuff out of the sky faster so he can build a snowman.
Mama, on the other hand, is quite happy to sit by the fire. Snowmen are Daddies' jobs, right?

Today, Dazaifu Tenmangu Shrine "Embassy of plum" came to the official residence. I got a plum bonsai to inform you of the arrival of spring. I would like to do my best from tomorrow so that the draft budget being deliberated will also bear fruit.

We received the "Leadership Award" at the "Delhi Sustainable Development Summit" in India. I am deeply honored. I would like to work hard on the issue of global warming so as not to be ashamed of this award. I could not attend the awards ceremony, so I entrusted my feelings to the message. http://bit.ly/9irY9C
Friends: here we are with my family in ranco taking advantage of the last weekend to do some sport, rest and return on Monday
@ Bryant732000 that's right!
@twiterillo had not had a minute for nothing!

Today, I encouraged the SDF 's supply supporters returning from the Indian Ocean and the troops dispatched to Haiti PKO. Under the harsh environment, I sent a heart-warming ale to the members of the people who protect the world's life. There was something that approached the chest as you looked at the face of a small child who was coming to see me off to pick up.
Today I gave an interview for the school newspaper Hrvoje and Dominik. http://bit.ly/aufsys
Watch the show "Trust Thailand with Prime Minister Abhisit" today on Channel 11 at 9 am

During the opening of the Diet, from early morning till late night, I will be busy preparing answers and meeting. The official residence of the workplace and the residence of the residence are 20 seconds on foot, saving time and being saved. After the work, turn the doorknob of the official residence. It is a moment of relief. Because the workmanship is beautiful, I took it in the picture. http://bit.ly/cqDqEA
Arriving in Stgo after a short vacation, rained, worked but equally entertained and enjoyed. This Tuesday GREAT CABINET

I met with Palestinian Authority's President Abbas. The Middle East is not a "distant area" from Japan. I promised that I would not spare Japan as Japan so that Palestine and Israel could coexist in peace. http://bit.ly/an6IvL
@roelmuller Wow! Kilimanjaro! If u want another (less back breaking) challenge, sign up as many people as u can to # 1GOAL. Good luck!
@carmiina I hope u enjoyed WEF as much as me! Sorry to have missed ur Being Responsible session. Good luck as a global changemaker!
@notoriousbug Education for All is ABSOLUTELY plausible, & there's nothing more unequalitarian than equal access to quality education.
My relationship with Vice President Suthep No problem, according to the news. The party's agenda is still left. we stay together Thanks!

My twitter is also being read by high school students and college students. There were opinions such as employment and concerns about the future, and that politicians are talking only to adults. I think about politicians thinking about everyone who is responsible for the future of Japan, and I would like to speak in an easy-to-understand way.
Upcoming elections should be characterized by peace,security,stability - Rwandans must fully,freely and fairly express..http://bit.ly/cE4adh
